title: Lease on life
creator_credit: Ermerson Yorke Studio and Emerson Yorke
brief_description: The story of an average American family and how they plan to avoid unnecessary illness. Shows the forces of prevention in action, the conflict between superstition and fact, and the effective combination of skilled hands and trained minds in medical teamwork, with special reference to anti-tuberculosis measures.
